<title level="1" right="Trait">[Infantry](/Traits.aspx?ID=455)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 569</row>

Infantry consists of soldiers or creatures that move on foot.
